name: Juggling Demonstration
effects: Reduce detection counter by 1. Gain an affiliation.

name: UFO Sighting
effects: Ignore person requirements for this turn.

name: Tell a Stranger a little too much
effects: Advance detection counter, witness of your choice becomes an ally.

name: Throw the First Pitch
effects: Put target card in your discard pile into your hand.

name: Trip to Lost & Found
effects: Put target card in evidence back into the deck.

name: Cut in Line
effects: Reduce detection by 2. Draw a person card.

name: Chop Wood
effects: Reduce detection counter 1 for each card discarded this turn.

name: Clean the Gun
effects: Play target action card from evidence and then place it at the bottom of the deck.

name: Check My Pockets
effects: Put the top 2 cards of the deck onto the map. For each item card, reduce detection counter 1

name: Ask for Directions
effects: Trigger the effect of any Action or Item card on the Map, normal costs apply.

name: Magic Trick
effects: Each player gives 1 card to the player on on their left.

name: Hallway Bump
effects: Advance the detection counter 1, each player gains and 1 affiliation or draws a card.

name: Pay Someone to Dig a Hole
effects: Put target item card from evidence into play.

name: One Last Round
effects: Turn one person into an ally.

name: Break into a Car
effects: Put an item card from your hand on the map and draw two cards.

name: Deliver Giant Check & Balloons
effects: Shuffle up to 3 evidence in o the deck.

name: Happy Hour
effects: Look at the top card of your deck, if it's an item, put it into your hand.

name: Lucky Trip to the Dump
effects: Put a card from the map on the bottom of the deck.
